title: Exploring the Zero-Shot Capabilities of Vision-Language Models for Improving Gaze Following
details: A Gupta, P Vuillecard, A Farkhondeh, JM Odobez - arXiv preprint arXiv:2406.03907, 2024
abstract: Contextual cues related to a person's pose and interactions with objects and other people in the scene can provide valuable information for gaze following. While existing methods have focused on dedicated cue extraction methods, in this work we …
